issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
i updated Xcode to the last version
and updated studio to build: 3.4.0.201409161931

but now my ios sdk isn't detected

"Could not detect a valid SDK with version '6' or...per/Platforms/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer/SDKs'"

i tried to set it again with xcode-select but without soucess
fields.environment:
Xcode 6.0.1
iPhone SDK 7.1 and 8
Studio build: 3.4.0.201409161931

comments.body: Can you make sure the default selected select is 3.4.x (see the output of "ti sdk" command and verify 3.4.x is selected) ? If you have CLI, SDK and Studio everything updated to 3.4.x and the SDK in TiApp and default selected in CLI points to latest 3.4x, then the iOS simulators should be available in the launch options.
